content: कुः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The earth. {@--2@} The base of a triangle or any plane figure.

कु {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A prefix implying ‘badness’, ‘deterioration,’ ‘depreciation’, ‘sin,’ ‘reproach,’ ‘littleness,’ ‘want,’ ‘deficiency’ &c. Its various substitutes are कद्(कदश्व), कव(कवोष्ण), का(कोष्ण), किं (किंप्रभुः); <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Pt. 5. 17.</ls>
कु {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (कवते) To sound. {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> (कुवते) {@--1@} To moan, groan. {@--2@} To cry. {vIII.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (कौति) To hum, coo (as a bee).
